text:
I'll be speaking about “EDI (Equality, Diversity & Inclusion) in the R Community” as part of the DiveRSE series, tomorrow! This will include talking about the work on the R Contribution Working Group. The talk will be followed by open discussion.

Time: Wednesday 4th May 2022 - 15:00-16:00 UTC
Free registration: <https://us06web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZUsduuorjItHtRqDKkgy-wqQv1hgnI2NbUZ>
More info: <https://diverse-rse.github.io/events/2022-05-04>

attachments.fallback: DiveRSE - Supporting EDI within the RSE community
attachments.text: The home of a series of talks and related activities for promoting awareness of and supporting EDI within the Research Software Engineering community.
attachments.title: DiveRSE - Supporting EDI within the RSE community
